mapper.insert: INSERT INTO animal (anino, aname, age, gender, weight, genop, intro, anipic, noticeSdt, noticeEdt, happenPlace, careNm, careTel, colorCd, adopt, animal_date) VALUES (#{anino}, #{aname}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{weight}, #{genop}, #{intro}, #{anipic}, #{noticeSdt}, #{noticeEdt}, #{happenPlace}, #{careNm}, #{careTel}, #{colorCd}, #{adopt}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT anino, aname, age, gender, weight, genop, intro, anipic, adopt, cnt, adopt_pos, animal_date FROM animal ORDER BY animal_date desc LIMIT #{offset}, #{size};

SELECT anino, aname, age, gender, gender, weight, genop, intro, anipic, adopt, animal_date, noticeSdt, noticeEdt, happenPlace, careNm, careTel, colorCd FROM animal WHERE DATE(noticeEdt) >= CURDATE() ORDER BY DATE(noticeEdt) ASC LIMIT 4;
SELECT COUNT(eduno) FROM education WHERE uid = #{uid} AND score >= 60 AND eduop LIKE CONCAT('%', #{anino}, '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM adopt WHERE DATE_FORMAT(sub_date, '%y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y%m%d')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adopt (uid, anino, apno, sub_cont, sub_state, sub_date, subpic) VALUES (#{uid}, #{anino}, #{apno}, #{sub_cont}, DEFAULT, now(), #{subpic})
